blogs.title: Getting Started with React and TypeScript
blogs.excerpt: Learn how to set up a React project with TypeScript and build type-safe applications from the ground up.
blogs.content:
Introduction

React and TypeScript are a powerful combination for building robust web applications. In this article, we'll explore how to get started with both technologies.

Setting Up Your Project

First, create a new React app with TypeScript support using Create React App...

TypeScript Basics

TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript, which helps catch errors early in development...

Conclusion

Combining React with TypeScript creates a more maintainable and scalable codebase.
